content: When you tell someone what you are planning to do and what you will achieve, you don’t have a choice anymore. You can quit and become a failure, or you can keep going and win that battle. We want to be successful in the eyes of society and no one will accept the fact that you could ruin your image in their eyes. It’s a problem because we are too obsessed with what others think about us. But, whatever we say we don’t care what society thinks about us. We are humans, we are the same and unfortunately, we care. But, it should and it will drive us forward.
